newsitem.title: USA: CA ships Unicenter TNG for SAP AG.
newsitem.headline: CA ships Unicenter TNG for SAP AG.

text.p: Computer Associates International Inc said Tuesday it started shipping Unicenter TNG, providing multi-platform management software for SAP AG's R/3 management software.
Unicenter TNG software offers end-to-end management of distributed R/3 applications across multiple platforms, operating systems and R/3 systems from a single management console, the company said.
The terms of the transaction were not disclosed.

"Rather than just assembling a portfolio of point products and patching them together on a desktop, Unicenter TNG for SAP R/3 integrates the full range of networks, servers, databases and SAP applications in the corporate environment, providing true application-centric management," said Sanjay Kumer, Computer Associates president and chief operating officer.
